****************************************************************** Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Issue Reported: {!Case.Description}
Hello,
We wanted to send an update on an issue that you had previously reported. The problem was with streaming audio and video files with media players embedded in your store.
A change in our server system configuration has resolved the issue. Please let us know if you continue to have any issues streaming media files.
Our apologies for any inconvenience and we appreciate your patience while we resolved the issue.
Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have further questions. Technical support is available 24/7:
BigCommerce Support http://support.bigcommerce.com
